Test Name: Neisseria meningitidis IgG Vaccine Response Assay
Purpose: To measure Neisseria meningitidis–specific IgG levels for evaluating the effectiveness of vaccination.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: ELISA plate reader, micropipettes, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, 37 °C incubator
